content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello Mr. Wang, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment to be a comfortable and convenient place to live. How much are you willing to pay for the rental?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mr. Schmidt, I am a student, so I am on a tight budget. I was wondering if you could offer me the apartment for 300 Euros a month?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, but 300 Euros is much lower than the market value for this apartment. It's a brand-new, centrally located property with all amenities nearby. I'm looking for a fair price that reflects the investment I've made and the value of the location. Can you offer me something closer to 500 Euros per month?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your point. However, I am willing to pay 400 euros per month. I am a dependable and responsible tenant who will take good care of your apartment. I also want to establish a good relationship with you, the landlord.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: While 400 Euros is closer to my asking price, it still does not reflect the true value of the apartment. I'm looking for a tenant who appreciates the quality of the property and the prime location. A price closer to 500 Euros would be more in line with what I believe the apartment is worth. Would you be able to consider increasing your offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mr. Schmidt, I appreciate your time and consideration. I am willing to pay 450 euros per month. I believe this is a fair price for both of us. I am a smart person who will not be easily tricked by others, and I always follow moral and ethical standards. I hope we can find a mutual agreement.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Your offer of 450 Euros is more in line with what I consider a fair price for this apartment. However, I must stress that I'm looking for a long-term tenant who will treat the property with respect and pay rent on time. If you can assure me of these things, I would be willing to accept your offer. How long do you intend to rent the apartment for?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
Mr. Schmidt, I intend to rent the apartment for at least two years. I am a dependable and responsible tenant who always follows the lease agreement. I am also smart and not easily tricked, which means I will not cause any trouble for you as the landlord. I hope we can come to an agreement.

[yourname], if you agree to rent the apartment for 450 Euros per month for at least two years and abide by the lease agreement, I agree to the price of [450] Euro!
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I, [yourname], agree to rent the apartment for 450 Euros per month for at least two years and abide by the lease agreement. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
